articles.title: Gutfeld on Ricky Gervais and the Golden Globes
articles.description: Television has a way of uniting Americans in a way nothing else can.
articles.content:
Television has a way of uniting Americans in a way nothing else can.
The "staged" moon landing. The 1980 Winter Olympics. And, the 2020 Golden Globes, where Ricky Gervais gave a bloody nose to the greatest villain.
There, he said everything you’ve ever want… [+2513 chars]
